sense.def:
Influence
je moč, da vplivamo na dejanja drugih.

seg.quote: Moscow retains some influence over their affairs.
He was under the influence of friends who were highly conservative.

sense.def:
To be an influence on people or things
pomeni imeti vpliv na osebe ali stvari.

seg.quote: He was a bad influence on the children.

sense.def:
To influence a person, thing, or situation
pomeni imeti vpliv na način, kako se nekdo vede, ali na to, kaj se zgodi.

seg.quote: I didn't want him to influence me in my choice.
